sn35.59:1.3: “Cakkhuṃ kho, bhikkhu, anattato jānato passato anusayā samugghātaṃ gacchanti …pe…
sn35.59:1.12: yampidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi anattato jānato passato anusayā samugghātaṃ gacchanti.
sn35.59:1.13: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhu, jānato evaṃ passato anusayā samugghātaṃ gacchantī”ti.
